content: MT-P-G OC Modular plate Modular plate for mounting modular structures on structural steel without the need for direct fastening ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Lighter MEP support structures – save weight compared with MI and welded solutions Compatible with the Hilti Adaptive Torque system – use a cordless impact wrench to tighten nuts to the correct pretension more economically (compatible tool and SI-AT module required) Applications Attaching triangular bracing and grid baseplates to structural steel without the need for direct fastening Bracing connections to steel, girder cantilevers with MT-70/80 to steel and back plates for sandwich connections ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 12 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 12 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2345354 - Plate MT-P-GM S2 OC set - Package Size 2 pc - 2345353 - Plate MT-P-GM S1 OC set - Package Size 2 pc - 2343280 - Plate MT-P-G S2 OC - Package Size 1 pc - 2343199 - Plate MT-P-G S1 OC - Package Size 1 pc - 2345355 - Plate MT-P-GM S3 OC set - Package Size 2 pc - 2343281 - Plate MT-P-G S3 OC - Package Size 1 pc
